## Size.copyFrom() method

Updates the current size from the given one.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
copyFrom(src: Size): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  src | <code>Size</code> | the given size |
